item.title: Vscode Build With Multiple Commands
item.description: In the past few weeks I started to get familiar with LitElement. I love the starter kit, but I hate to start up the manual build tasks. Nowadays I work with VSCode a lost, so I tried to come up with a convenient vendor locked-in solution for a change.
